title: New rune page limit?
body:
I bought 21st rune page.
How many rune pages can i buy?

replies.body: What Ainz Oool Gown said!  You should cap at 25, including the presets you get!
ty! But it seems to cap at 25 expect the preset pages.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
ye, def. ignores the 5 preset pages, I just bought my 21st page and got 21 + the 5 premade ones now, intended?
seems to cap at 25, at least i cant buy any more after i got my 25th
Where do you see rune pages for purchase? I can't find them...
They're under accessories in the store, not very intuitive.
wow we still have to buy rune pages? that's actually so bullshit.

> [{quoted}](name=not a girl,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oMU1FvgQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-18T06:52:14.919+0000)
>
> wow we still have to buy rune pages? that's actually so bullshit.

You could just buy one and optimize it to every different champion you pick in your match, that's what I do, cuz ain't no extra rune pages taking my champion essence.

I do it all the time! Especially since the blue essence is way harder to get than IP was back then.
I had tons of IP. I used to earn it faster than I could spend it. Now I try to avoid spending my essence unless it's absolutely necessary because now we only get the "first win of the day" essence, and the quests whenever something comes up.
